answers.answer: Hello,It is very difficult to make a diagnosis without examination but the various possibilities for your increased appetite(also called polyphagia) are increased exercise and physical activity,growth spurt,hormone imbalances( hyperthyroidism or hyperadrenalism), uncontrolled diabetes,depression,bulimia nervosa( an eating disorder that usually result in eating binges),certain drugs or medications(like  antihistamines, steroids, marijuana, or large amounts of alcohol)  and damage to an area of the brain called the hypothalamus(This is a rare condition).I feel that you should get your blood sugar levels and thyroid profile checked because dizziness,increased appetitie,fatigue,exhaustion and muscle spasms can be due to either of them.Pls consult a physician and discuss these possibilities with him.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing.
